caption:
Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths. — Proverbs 3:5-6

This passage reminds us that faith steadies a restless heart. Peace deepens as we choose prayer over worry, one decision at a time. Speak this verse aloud and carry it into one task today.
